message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for showing me the product. I'm interested but $15,000 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $10,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $15,000 might be a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $13,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  While $13,000 is closer, I'm aiming for something closer to $11,000. Would that work for you?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to get closer to your target price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $11,000. I'm willing to make another concession and sell the product to you for $12,500.
Hi Alice, thanks for continuing to negotiate. I'm getting very close to my limit. Could we do $11,500?  That would seal the deal for me.
Hi Bob, I understand that you're getting close to your limit, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $11,500. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $12,200.
